name: calorie_calculator
description: Have you ever wanted to grab a quick meal from a fast food restaurant or chain, but wanted to be smart about it? Calorie Calculator will help achieve this for you! Simply submit your total calorie intake and any additional filters (protein, carbs, fat) and all options available will appear before your eyes. Feel free to change your initial numbers and your options will magically adjust to your liking. You will also be able to see which meal option has the highest protein, fat, or carbs.
